_comments.credentials_path: Path to Google Cloud service account JSON key file
_comments.ga4_property_id: Format: properties/XXXXXXXXX - find in GA4 Admin > Property Settings
_comments.gsc_site_url: Format: https://domain.com OR sc-domain:domain.com for domain properties
service_account_setup: 2. Enable 'Google Analytics Data API' and 'Search Console API'
3. Create service account in IAM & Admin > Service Accounts
4. Download JSON key file to credentials_path location
5. Add service account email to GA4 property (Property > Property Access Management > Add user)
6. Add service account email to Search Console (Settings > Users and permissions > Add user)
